```{r}
#Add libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(readxl)
library(data.table)
```

```{r}
#read in data and remove 
z <- read_excel("~/Desktop/Spring 2021/Capstone/zs_r.xlsx")
no_z <- z %>% filter(time_stamp %like% "###")
z <- anti_join(z, no_z)
z <- z[complete.cases(z), ]
```


```{r}
z_s <- z %>% filter(other_device == 'c0:98:e5:42:01:03')
```
